channel.title: San Francisco on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in San Francisco on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Claude Fans Threw a Funeral for Anthropic’s Retired AI Model
item.description: Roughly 200 people gathered in San Francisco on Saturday to mourn the loss of Claude 3 Sonnet, an older AI model that Anthropic recently killed.

item.title: Claude Fans Threw a Funeral for Anthropic’s Retired AI Model
item.description: Roughly 200 people gathered in San Francisco on Saturday to mourn the loss of Claude 3 Sonnet, an older AI model that Anthropic recently killed.

item.title: Tesla Readies a Taxi Service in San Francisco—but Not With Robotaxis
item.description: The electric car maker informed California that it will operate a limited public taxi service. But it’s not legally allowed to do this with self-driving cars.

item.title: Tesla Readies a Taxi Service in San Francisco—but Not With Robotaxis
